problem.p: Which of the following are benefits of having functions? Check all that apply.

div.p: Abstraction: This is the main idea of functions. For example, let's say we want to make 3 squares of size 4, 5, and 6. If we didn't use a fucntion with an input "size square", then we would have to repeat the same code 3 times with different inputs.
Composing Functions Together: We can create bigger more signitificant programs by combining functions.
Parallelization: As Dan mentioned in his slides, with functions we can write software that runs on miltiple sysems a the same time.
